issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fixVersions.description: The release will stabilize core components, improve performances and adds new streaming algorithms. Unmaintained code is getting killed as part of this

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

versions.description: Primarily a cleanup and refactoring release. Some new functionality which has been previously completed and tested may be introduced.
The release will stabilize core components, improve performances and adds new streaming algorithms. Unmaintained code is getting killed as part of this

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: VectorHelper.topEntries() throws a NPE when number of NonZero elements in vector < maxEntries

comments.body: When the number of nonZero elements in the input is < maxEntries, the call to queue.pop returns a Pair<null, null>. The subsequent call to pair.getFirst() results in a NullPointerException.

Integrated in Mahout-Quality #2021 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Mahout-Quality/2021/])
    MAHOUT-1232: VectorHelper.topEntries() throws a NPE when number of NonZero elements in vector < maxEntries (Revision 1487279)

     Result = SUCCESS
smarthi : 
Files : 
* /mahout/trunk/CHANGELOG
* /mahout/trunk/integration/src/main/java/org/apache/mahout/utils/vectors/VectorDumper.java
* /mahout/trunk/integration/src/main/java/org/apache/mahout/utils/vectors/VectorHelper.java
* /mahout/trunk/integration/src/test/java/org/apache/mahout/utils/vectors/VectorHelperTest.java

Integrated in Mahout-Quality #2023 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Mahout-Quality/2023/])
    MAHOUT-1232: VectorHelper.topEntries() throws a NPE when number of NonZero elements in vector < maxEntries - Adding a unit test to address the scenario when the input vector has all zero elements. (Revision 1487645)

     Result = SUCCESS
smarthi : 
Files : 
* /mahout/trunk/integration/src/test/java/org/apache/mahout/utils/vectors/VectorHelperTest.java
